noun.description: A rough or unfinished drawing or painting, often made to assist in making a more finished picture.
A short humorous play or performance, consisting typically of one scene in a comedy program.
A comical or amusing person or thing.

examples: as they talked, Modigliani began to sketch her
Jeanne sketched and painted whenever she had the time

origin: Mid 17th century: from Dutch schets or German Skizze, from Italian schizzo, from schizzare make a sketch, based on Greek skhedios done extempore.
